attributes.action: Request the Dutch Government to Prevent Further Hostility Towards European Muslims by the Demonising of Islam by Right Wing Politician Geert Wilder's Film 'Fitna'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, European Muslims, are constant attack by those opposed to a harmonious society. The Islamophobes seem to have free access to a range of avenue to attack Muslims at every turn.

We, the undersigned, request the Prime Minister, to ensure that 'Free Speech' does not become a prelude to 'Free Hate' and 'Free Violence'. A truly FREE civilised society protects all it's members. A freedom to hate does not form any part it. This type of material is no different to anti-Semitic and Holocaust Denial materials and such should be subject to stringest criminal sanctions.

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
